verses.verse: And David<WH1732> said<WH559>, Is there yet<WH3426> any that is left<WH3498> of the house<WH1004> of Saul<WH7586>, that I may shew<WH6213> him kindness<WH2617> for Jonathan's<WH3083> sake?
